member.name: T:LucasRT.DGBK.RestApi.Configurations.SwaggerConfiguration
member.summary: Provides extension methods for configuring Swagger in an ASP.NET Core application.
member.remarks: This class contains methods to integrate Swagger documentation generation into the application's service collection. It enables features such as XML comments inclusion, custom schema IDs, and annotations.

member.name: M:LucasRT.DGBK.RestApi.Configurations.SwaggerConfiguration.AddSwaggerConfig(Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection)
member.summary: Configures Swagger services for the application, enabling API documentation generation.
member.remarks: This method adds Swagger generation capabilities to the application's service collection. It registers the Swagger documentation with metadata such as title, version, description, and contact information. Additionally, it includes XML comments for API documentation, enables annotations, and customizes schema IDs.
member.param: The to which Swagger services will be added.

member.name: T:LucasRT.DGBK.RestApi.Infrastructure.HmacSigner
member.summary: Provides functionality to generate HMAC-SHA256 signatures.
member.remarks: This class is designed to create secure signatures for data using a secret key and a timestamp. It is typically used in scenarios where data integrity and authenticity need to be verified.

member.name: M:LucasRT.DGBK.RestApi.Infrastructure.HmacSigner.Sign(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Generates a hexadecimal signature for the given input using HMAC-SHA256.
member.param: The secret key used for generating the HMAC signature. Cannot be null or empty.
The timestamp to include in the signature. Represents the time at which the signature is generated.
The body content to include in the signature. Represents the data to be signed.
member.returns: A lowercase hexadecimal string representing the HMAC-SHA256 signature of the combined timestamp and body.
